quest.name: With Open Arms
journal: Juliana of the Weavers' Guild finds herself at a troubling loss for manpower.

A gathering of Ul'dah's elite has brought an influx of orders that has thrown the Weavers' Guild into chaos. You have been asked to venture forth and /welcome any would-be workers to aid in this tumultuous time. First, practice your /welcome on Juliana.
Impressed with your display, Juliana has granted you leave to find her more employees. Use your warmest /welcome beyond the walls of the Weavers' Guild to recruit any help there is to be had.
Your inviting gestures were enough to entice at least two passersby to consider taking up the needle for the guild. Return to Juliana and see what she has to say.
Despite only being able to gather two more for the effort, Juliana seems well glad of extra help. The able bodies you have recruited are sure to prove invaluable to the Weavers' Guild.
objectives: Seek out any would-be weavers and give them a warm /welcome.
Report back to Juliana at the Weavers' Guild.

dialogue.name: JULIANA
dialogue.text: If it is work you seek, the Weavers' Guild welcomes you. Indeed, your timing is impeccable. A soirée is to be held with all of Ul'dah's elite in attendance.

dialogue.name: JULIANA
dialogue.text: Once the invites went out, the orders came in, and that with a fury. Every lord and lady from Cape Deadwind to the Cinderfoot is demanding the latest fineries.

dialogue.name: JULIANA
dialogue.text: I need hands, and I need them now. Yet I cannot spare the time to go off in search of them.

dialogue.name: JULIANA
dialogue.text: Would you care to aid us, friend? I ask no more than you welcome to our doors any willing souls you might find.

dialogue.name: JULIANA
dialogue.text: Come, let us see how you fare. Show me your warmest welcome.

dialogue.name: JULIANA
dialogue.text: Come, let us see how you fare. Show me your warmest welcome.

dialogue.name: JULIANA
dialogue.text: Excellent! I daresay I would work for you myself. Now hurry off! We need those people!

dialogue.name: JULIANA
dialogue.text: No, no, that simply will not serve. Come now, show me your warmest welcome.

dialogue.name: BIBICHUA
dialogue.text: So, the weavers need help, do they? Sorry, friend, I'm all set for coin.

dialogue.name: BIBICHUA
dialogue.text: Fancy my garb, do you? And well you should. It's all the latest rage.

dialogue.name: ESDELINE
dialogue.text: Work at the Weavers' Guild? Hmmm... I'd be lying if I said I weren't interested. To whom might I go to inquire further?

dialogue.name: ESDELINE
dialogue.text: We Ul'dahns have a weakness for fashion. Why, just look at me─I've taken the trouble to match my wrap to my hair. Ravishing, no?

dialogue.name: JELLION
dialogue.text: The weavers are recruiting!? Finally, my chance to become a famous designer!

dialogue.name: JELLION
dialogue.text: Gods, I can hardly contain myself thinking of the new dresses that will be at that party. Would that I were invited...

dialogue.name: SOSOTTA
dialogue.text: I appreciate the offer, but I must refuse. I'm all thumbs when it comes to stitching and whatnot.

dialogue.name: SOSOTTA
dialogue.text: Are you looking for a model? Oh, you naughty girlboy! Flattery will get you everywhere, hee hee.

dialogue.name: LURKINGREECH
dialogue.text: Weavin' work? Take a look at me, friend. I'm a bloody guard, and on duty, no less! Move along, now.

dialogue.name: LURKINGREECH
dialogue.text: What? What do you want? I've no time for your shenanigans. You're gettin' in my bloody way. Now, piss off!

dialogue.name: JULIANA
dialogue.text:
You've returned! Well, how did you fare?
...Two potential recruits, you say? Welcome news! I only hope their zeal for fashion will show in their efforts for the guild.

dialogue.name: JULIANA
dialogue.text: What we do here may seem all silk and satin, to be sure, but the work within these walls is far from easy. In that, I suppose our trade is not unlike any other.
